DatatypeLibraryFinder

public DatatypeLibraryFinder(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)

Constructor that specifies ClassLoader to use to find DatatypeLibrary.

Parameters:
loader - to be used to load resource, DatatypeLibrary, and DatatypeLibraryLoader implementations during the resolution process. If this parameter is null, the default system class loader will be used.
